extensions.name: AssemblyScript Hello Extension
extensions.description: A WASM extension written in AssemblyScript (TypeScript-like) with fast compile times and small binary size
extensions.author: CamThink

extensions.name: Weather Forecast
extensions.description: Global weather data and forecasts for any city
extensions.author: CamThink

extensions.name: Template Extension
extensions.description: A basic native extension template for NeoMind. Provides example metrics and commands to help developers get started with extension development.
extensions.author: NeoMind Team

extensions.name: Image Analyzer
extensions.description: Stateless image analysis extension that detects objects and analyzes image properties. Supports JPEG, PNG, and WebP formats.
extensions.author: NeoMind Team

extensions.name: YOLO Video Processor
extensions.description: Stateful video stream processing with YOLO object detection. Maintains session context for continuous video processing with real-time FPS metrics.
extensions.author: NeoMind Team
